# Design Managed Identities
Managed Identities provides an identity for application authentication.

![Managed Identities.](../images/design-managed-identities.png)

- The source is an Azure resource.
- The target supports Azure Active Directory authentication and Azure RBAC.
- No credential rotation or certificate management.
